findings.title: The revenue for pack minting does not remain in the contract in some cases
findings.description: When DAO is changed using Packs#transferDAOownership(), the cost of pack minting is transferred to the new DAO instead of being stored in the contract, breaking implementation consistency.

findings.title: No Method to Move Ether Stored in Contract
findings.description: The contract does not have a function to extract the cost paid by users for pack minting, which is sent as msg.value.

findings.title: Some free claims require minting price payments
findings.description: The revenue for pack minting does not remain in the contract in some cases.

findings.title: The free claim feature does not work in Packs#bulkMintPack()
findings.description: The function Packs#bulkMintPack() does not check whether msg.sender is a free claim, resulting in users who are able to free claim having to pay additional costs for pack minting.

findings.title: Free claim function works only once
findings.description: The free claim feature allows users to mint a pack at no additional cost, but it can only be used once per user.

findings.title: Users can mint packs before saleStartTime with the free claim feature
findings.description: Users who are able to free claim can mint the pack from _saleStartTime - mintPassDuration_ , which is prior to the official _saleStartTime_.

findings.title: The input parameter of functions should be checked
findings.description: The function does not validate its input parameters, which can lead to unexpected behavior or security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Unnecessary gas may be used as a transaction fee
findings.description: The contract uses `call{value: excessAmount}()` to return excess Ether, which can lead to unnecessary gas usage as a transaction fee.

findings.title: Licenses can be added to non-existing collections
findings.description: _Packs#addNewLicense() has no statement that checks whether cid exists, thus licenses on non-existing collections can be added.

findings.title: _Packs#bulkMintPack() function enables minting multiple packs at once, but spends unnecessary gas when amount is 0
findings.description: The _Packs#bulkMintPack() function allows minting multiple packs simultaneously. However, it still executes and wastes unnecessary gas even when the user sets the input parameter 'amount' to 0.
